name: FOX 32 Chicago
profile:
Welcome to the official YouTube page for FOX 32 Chicago. FOX 32 News is your source for news, weather, sports and more. Find us on the web at https://www.FOX32chicago.com.

WFLD-TV is the owned-and-operated Fox station in Chicago, Illinois. It is co-owned with sister WPWR.

Watch Live Streaming Newscasts:

Monday - Friday:
4:30am - 10am, 12pm - 1pm, 4pm - 5pm, 5pm -6pm, 9pm - 10pm

Saturday:
7am - 9am
9pm - 10pm

Sunday:
7am - 9am
9pm - 10pm
